title: Showcase a Map
desc: Let your map speak for itself.

templates.title: Story Map Basic
templates.desc: Displays a map with a legend that can be toggled on/off.

templates.title: Simple Viewer
templates.desc: Provides an easy configuration experience and simple interface.

templates.title: Legend
templates.desc: Prominently displays the legend with the ability to add a header, a description, and a footer.

templates.title: Basic Viewer
templates.desc: Displays a set of commonly used tools on a toolbar and a slide-in panel.

templates.title: Map Tools
templates.desc: Displays a set of commonly used tools on a toolbar. Supports a table view of layers.

templates.title: Finder
templates.desc: Search a preconfigured layer.

title: Collect/Edit Data
desc: Collect new data or edit the location and field values of existing data.

templates.title: Basic Viewer
templates.desc: Provides an edit tool along with other popular tools.

templates.title: Find, Edit, Filter
templates.desc: Provides a configurable search experience in addition to editing capabilities.

templates.title: Edit
templates.desc: Prominently features an editing panel.

templates.title: GeoForm
templates.desc: A form-based experience for adding features. Supports crowdsourcing data collection.

templates.title: Crowdsource Reporter
templates.desc: Allows users to submit observations/problems through a template created by the app author.

templates.title: Crowdsource Manager
templates.desc: Allows members of an organization to monitor and review reported oberservations/problems.

templates.title: Information Lookup
templates.desc: Track where users are clicking to get information.

templates.title: Information Lookup
templates.desc: Tells users if a service is available at a given location.

templates.title: Local Perspective
templates.desc: Shows features and gives demographic data around a user-selected point.

title: Route/Get Directions
desc: Route between locations and get directions.

templates.title: Local Perspective
templates.desc: Provides directions to features within a radius of a user-selected point.

templates.title: Directions
templates.desc: Provides directions between a feature on a map and a user-selected point/address.

title: Analyze/Summarize Data
desc: Create visual, interactive representations of your data for summary and analysis.

templates.title: Filter
templates.desc: Filter data by applying operations on field values.

templates.title: Time Aware
templates.desc: Visualize the distribution of your data over time.

templates.title: Impact Summary
templates.desc: Summarize data about a polygon feature.

templates.title: Summary Viewer
templates.desc: Summarize data about all of the features in the current map extent.

templates.title: Elevation Profile
templates.desc: Visualize the elevation profile of linear features.

title: Create Map/App Gallery
desc: Create a gallery of many maps or apps.

templates.title: Public Gallery
templates.desc: Displays all of the items from a group in a grid or a list.

templates.title: Maps & Apps Gallery
templates.desc: Displays all of the items from a group in a grid or a list.

templates.title: Map Carousel
templates.desc: Displays the web maps from a group in a carousel.

title: Compare Maps/Layers
desc: Compare two or more maps or layers.

templates.title: Map Carousel
templates.desc: Displays the web maps from a group in a carousel.

templates.title: Compare Analysis
templates.desc: Displays multiple maps with the capability to sync map extents.

templates.title: Public Information
templates.desc: Swipe between layers in a web map.

templates.title: Story Map Swipe & Spyglass
templates.desc: Interactively compare maps with a magnifying glass or slider tool.

templates.title: Story Map Series
templates.desc: Display maps in tabs, a bulleted list, an accordian control.

title: Narrate a Story
desc: Tell a story using a narrative sequence.

templates.title: Story Map Journal
templates.desc: Create a sequence of pages containing maps, text and/or graphics.

templates.title: Story Map Series
templates.desc: Display maps in tabs, a bulleted list, an accordian control.

templates.title: Story Map Swipe & Spyglass
templates.desc: Compare layers or maps with a spyglass or magnifying glass.

templates.title: Story Map Tour
templates.desc: Take users through a sequence of pictures or videos and their locations on a map.

title: Map Social Media
desc: Display social media content on a map.

templates.title: Public Information
templates.desc: Overlays geolocated content from Twitter, Instagram, Flickr, YouTube and webcams.travel on a map.

templates.title: Twitter
templates.desc: Overlays geolocated tweets on a map.
